function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Creating open and closed spaces for gatherings within a building","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission in social gatherings","Mitigation":"Implement strict ventilation systems and limit the size of gatherings","Technologies":"Air purification systems, occupancy sensors","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Bringing nature into every apartment unit","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through shared green spaces","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of green areas","Technologies":"Automated watering systems, self-cleaning coatings","People":"Apartment occupants","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Activation of inner yards for social activities","Impact":"Risk of disease transmission in crowded social spaces","Mitigation":"Implement scheduling and capacity limits for activities","Technologies":"Reservation systems, contact tracing apps","People":"Local residents, visitors","Owner":"Local community or building management"}]}
